name: WPReadability
author: Kevin Davies

sections.description: Simply install. Readability level for your posts and pages will appear on the appropriate table.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/readability directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

That’s it!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/readability directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

That’s it!

short_description: Displays readability level for your posts and pages.
description: Simply install. Readability level for your posts and pages will appear on the appropriate table.
